The effect of the available accessories can be made even stronger by finishing. Finishing requires Selenite and Solvent for Accessories .
To get Selenite, you must dissolve the accessory. Just keep in mind that in this case he will disappear forever.
But upon completion, all other characteristics of the accessories are stored , so if you change your mind, you can easily return the item to its previous state. Like this! What do you want?
